name: {{countryCode}} Alert Condition - {{appName}} - Application - Http 4XX Errors - Abnormal Error Count

nrql.query: SELECT count(*) FROM TransactionError WHERE clusterName = cluster_name AND namespaceName IN (namespace_names) AND appName IN (appNames) AND httpResponseCode LIKE '4%' FACET appName, httpResponseCode, error.class, error.message
